<title level="1" pfs="">[Protosoul](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2513)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 11">[Protosoul](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2513)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Divine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=48" />
<trait label="Mindless" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=108" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #189: Dreamers of the Nameless Spires](/Sources.aspx?ID=195) pg. 58</row>

**Perception** +19; [lifesense](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=21)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +22

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +5

**Dex** +5

**Con** +7

**Int** -5

**Wis** +0

**Cha** -5
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 31 

**Fort** +24 

**Ref** +22 

**Will** +17 

</row>

**HP** 190

**Immunities**
bleed, [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [doomed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=9), [drained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10), [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15), [healing](/Traits.aspx?ID=89), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [negative](/Traits.aspx?ID=118), [nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188) attacks, [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [sickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

**Absorb Necromancy** A protosoul is made of necromantic energy. Any time it would be affected by another creature's non-cantrip [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117) spell, after applying its immunity, it also regains 10 Hit Points.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** fly 40 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
necromantic tendril +22 ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 3d10+11 force

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
necromantic bolt +22 ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [range increment 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)),
**Damage** 2d10+11 force

**Divine Innate Spells** DC 30, attack +22
- **Cantrips (5th)**
[Chill Touch](/Spells.aspx?ID=35)
- **3rd**
[Sudden Blight](/Spells.aspx?ID=720) (at will; see Unstable Magic)
- **4th**
[Enervation](/Spells.aspx?ID=687) (at will; see Unstable Magic)
- **5th**
[Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) (at will; see Unstable Magic)

**[Engulf](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=14)** <actions string="Two Actions" />  DC 30, 2d8 force plus 3d8 negative, [Escape](/Actions.aspx?ID=79) DC 30, Rupture 25

**Unstable Magic**   The roiling protosoul can't be healed or [Repaired](/Actions.aspx?ID=42), and is destroyed at 0 Hit Points. So long as it is not destroyed, it naturally recovers 77 Hit Points each day. Each time a roiling protosoul casts one of its non-cantrip spells, it drains its own magic to do so, taking 6 force damage.

</column>
name: Protosoul

Any time it would be affected by another creature's non-cantrip necromancy spell, after applying its immunity, it also regains 10 Hit Points. --- Speed fly 40 feet Melee Single Action necromantic tendril +22 (Divine, Magical, Necromancy, reach 10 feet), Damage 3d10+11 force Ranged Single Action necromantic bolt +22 (Divine, Magical, Necromancy, range increment 30 feet), Damage 2d10+11 force Divine Innate Spells DC 30, attack +22 - Cantrips (5th) Chill Touch - 3rd Sudden Blight (at will; see Unstable Magic) - 4th Enervation (at will; see Unstable Magic) - 5th Harm (at will; see Unstable Magic) Engulf Two Actions DC 30, 2d8 force plus 3d8 negative, Escape DC 30, Rupture 25 Unstable Magic The roiling protosoul can't be healed or Repaired, and is destroyed at 0 Hit Points. So long as it is not destroyed, it naturally recovers 77 Hit Points each day. Each time a roiling protosoul casts one of its non-cantrip spells, it drains its own magic to do so, taking 6 force damage.
